snippet.title: Feltopia Trailer
snippet.description:
Your first look at the world and gameplay of FELTOPIA!  This game is a cozy take on arcade side-scrollers, set in a hand-felted wooly world brought to life with stop-motion animation. Sky is a magical sheep herder who must harness their growing powers to save the Rainbow Flock and purge an insidious Smog Spirit that is engulfing the land in darkness.

#indiegame #indiegaming #stopmotionvideo #felted 

Developer: Wooly Games
Andrea Love, Creative Director, @andreageorgialove 
Andy Katsikapes, Lead Developer
Eric Love, Game Writer
Michelle Hagewood, Story Art & Production Assistant
Peter Michael Davison, Composer
Richard Gould, Sound Designer
